channel.title: MENTIOS 718/742 RELEASE | Livid Farm | Artisan's Workshop | Noticeboard
channel.description:
[b]I'm Fuzen Seth / Nexon.[/b]
The mysterious server, which I reached 80 players in two weeks after launch. Time to move on, too many 718 leeches these days. [B] Download Mentios Server: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!IF4FgZQK!bRK3sAwGURVqeO_xOPmaHW49PSMaN_8aJGFCljzrD40]https://mega.co.nz/#!IF4FgZQK!bRK3sAwGURVqeO_xOPmaHW49PSMaN_8aJGFCljzrD40[/url]
Download Matrix 718 Client: [url=http://uppit.com/egryvvfel2dx/718_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/egryvvfel2dx/718_Client.rar[/url] [/B] This has some unique features that I have made, for an example: Noticeboard, Livid Farm, Area Manager which is shit go remove it xD! HideAndSeek starter (very well done tbh).
[B]Media[/B]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2wq4a4x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2n021pl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/if4voj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/293avc7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/zxjy1y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/9sdp2e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2jgqhg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w6sfmc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/k2e5p4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25q7ubo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n82b1t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5dmc1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qdpwgp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2dace10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/syo9pd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/351wb47.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ynhv1h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14n22js.jpg[/img]
[B][CENTER]---CREDITS--- -NEXON / FUZEN SETH -JOSH (JOSHREYNOLDS) -DRAGONKK -MATRIX TEAM.[/CENTER][/B]

... 23 more

Other bugs:

GE ground is like super glitchy it’s like part of the ground isn’t blending with the solid ground part.

Insert Item mode in bank does not work

Search button in bank isn’t 100%. Let’s say if you type in “cam” for camelot tabs… you then go and erase everything you just typed and press enter. It will close the text interface where you type in the word but it will not refresh the bank to the regular screen.

Collection box/options for it are not developed yet I assume

Bank pins are not developed yet I assume

Please refer to attachment #1: Bad grammar - wording in dialogue. Same with the dialogue screen before that!

Not sure of reason and it may just be because I was trying to help find bugs for you so some weird config happened or something… but sometimes when I try to go to bank it won’t open the bank interface and I have to click the minimap to move again.

Can’t edit price manually in G.E, can’t edit quanity in G.E. , sell option opens general shop interface.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

Can this source run with Zenith client? Since some of my friends have lots of client lagg when running this server, and I have no lagg, and I’m hosting on a VPS, they say its the client, when I try to run it with Zenith it won’t work, I guess this needs Matrix, is there anyway to fix the lagg? Because people lagg out almost immediately when they login.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“MentiosRSPS, post:21, topic:519767”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=638261.msg4301968#msg4301968 date=1369155170]
Just curious, does this cache/client fix all the the random blackouts on all of the matrix leeches? …Get bloody tired of playing the 718’s and get randomly blacked…
[/quote]

Cache makes it, it’s matrix 718 loading 742 cache, ofc its buggy as love. Stupid question. - Fuzen Seth[/quote]eh never looked at a higher revision much was just curious. I’m sure there must be a way to fix the blackouts though?

Read full topic
